channel.title: Background
channel.description: I can't find where to change the background of my client. I've looked through with Tom's Cache Editor Suite, looked through the cache folder, and I just can't seem to find it. The base I'm using is a PI. I'd also like someone to supply me an old rs login box and button (Stone login box ;D).

item.title: Background
item.dc:creator: @HonorScape HonorScape
item.description:
@HonorScape wrote:

I Vain I:

Both the client and the cache.

The cache is in the client.

And should I PM you the link or post it here?

Read full topic

item.title: Background
item.dc:creator: @HonorScape HonorScape
item.description:
@HonorScape wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Remove the ip from your client, and upload it, as well as the cache.

Post the link here, and I’ll let you know where it is loading from.[/quote]

The IP is set to 127.0.0.1 atm for me. Should I upload only the cache or the whole client?

Read full topic

item.title: Background
item.dc:creator: @HonorScape HonorScape
item.description:
@HonorScape wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Dumped directly from the 317 cache (no edits):

As for the BG, it could be loaded from a url, the cache, a local file, etc.[/quote]

Thanks. And uh, where would I find that?

Read full topic
